title: Tanzania president sworn in as opposition says hundreds killed in protests
subhed: Hassan, who was inaugurated for a second term on Monday, was elevated from vice president after the sudden death of her predecessor John Magufuli in 2021. Election day, despite a heavy security presence, descended into chaos, with Hassan calling for 'unity and solidarity' in her speech, promising a return to normality.

title: Rosalía returns with mystical album: 'God has given me so much, the least I could do is make an album for him'
subhed: Three albums and a string of hit singles have propelled her to the ranks of global pop divas. After a three-year hiatus, the 33-year-old Catalan artist returns with 'Lux,' a musical fresco in praise of the divine and major female saints.

title: France's new 'unproductive wealth' tax reflects a limited adjustment
subhed: MPs approved on Friday a modification of the real estate wealth tax. Its base was broadened, but the tax rate was reduced by a third for the very wealthy. Its yield remains unclear.

title: 'Airbnb is easy money and it's highly addictive': Thousands of French turn their homes into hotels
subhed: 'The Airbnb Ogre' (5/6). Over the past decade, a whole economy has developed around short-term rentals, a rapidly growing market in France. Property owners readily call on concierge companies or specialists in listing and price optimization.
